code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function DAWIntegration(){const[selectedDAW,setSelectedDAW]=useState('FL Studio');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const BACKEND_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL||'';const handleConnect=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch("".concat(BACKEND_URL,"/daw/connect"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({daw:selectedDAW})});const data=await res.json();setResponse("Status: ".concat(data.status,", DAW: ").concat(data.daw));}catch(err){setResponse('Error connecting to DAW');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"DAW Integration (Optional)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"DAW connection is optional. You can use all features without connecting a DAW. If you want seamless workflow and real-time AI assistance, connect your favorite DAW (FL Studio, Ableton Live, Logic Pro, Cubase, Reaper, and more)."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Auto-detect DAW or select manually"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Plugin and protocol support (MIDI, OSC, VST, AU)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Real-time monitoring and advice"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"DAW-agnostic compatibility"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{style:{marginTop:'2rem'},onSubmit:handleConnect,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"daw-select",children:"Select your DAW:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"daw-select",value:selectedDAW,onChange:e=>setSelectedDAW(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"FL Studio",children:"FL Studio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Ableton Live",children:"Ableton Live"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Logic Pro",children:"Logic Pro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Cubase",children:"Cubase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Reaper",children:"Reaper"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Other",children:"Other"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},disabled:loading,children:loading?'Connecting...':'Connect'})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:response})]});}
